document.discussion_title: Selena Gomez announces UK arena tour – TICKETS | Viking FM - Number 1 for Yorkshire and Northern Lincolnshire. Your Music, Your Life
document.topic_text: Selena Gomez announces UK arena tour – TICKETS Posted on Monday 25 April 2016 Global pop sensation Selena Gomez has announced a UK arena tour for this November! The phenomenal singer, who released her acclaimed second solo album ‘Revival’ last autumn, will play the following dates: NOVEMBER 2016 London O2 Arena - Fri 4th Birmingham Genting Arena - Sun 6th Glasgow SSE Hydro - Thu 10th Selena says: “I’ve put my heart into making this tour something very special. I cannot wait to travel through Europe and see everyone!” Tickets are guaranteed to be high in demand and go on sale from Viking FM Tickets at 9am on Friday 29th April.
